overview: Triaphilia- A fear that terrible things come in 3's. In a small store filled with antiques and curiosities called The Anointed Cherub, a charming proprietor convinces customers to purchase the items he feels are perfect for them...however, what they don't know is that each item comes with a horrible consequence. Triaphilia tells the story of 3 items that destroy the lives of the people that purchase them.
tagline: There is a reason bad things come in threes
title: Triaphilia
